entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 35 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
